column4: can anyone lead me in the right direction to get the desktop cube working. I have the latest nvidia drivers installed for my 9600gt and it is checked in ADES, yet it still doesnt want to work, also window effects dont work.
Did you start compiz?
hmm let me check hehe i hope im not that moronic :P
try typing "compiz --replace" in a terminal
whats the website to link text files to? so i can show you the terminal
I don't know, I'm a newbie myself
hehe ok
I just have the desktop cube working :)
And nobody wants to help me :(
http://rafb.net/p/i3s5f456.html look at that and let me know?
Hm, did you install the third party video driver? You need ti to run 3D acceleration
You have an nvidia card?
yep
yep to drivers or to nvidia?
nvidia...im PRETTY sure i have the latest drivers...but idk lol
does this help? http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-596927.html
yes it does! hehe thanks BUT NOW i think i dont have the right drivers for my video installed...im sure ill be back when i find out lol
Ok, good luck!

OK so another problem hah seems that the hardware isnt even recognizing that i have a video card at all :-/ System->Admin->Hardware Drivers only comes up with my wireless card...no video :O any ideas?
not a clue... I really just installed Ubuntu three days ago. I'm sorry, wish I could help.
hehe np man :) its nice to finally meet someone new to this haha
